Channel__c.Email: Email marketing campaign - prospect received targeted email content
Channel__c.Webinar: Live webinar event - prospect registered/attended to learn about specific topics
Channel__c.Content Syndication: Downloaded content from third-party sites - researching solutions
Channel__c.Paid Search: Found us through search ads - actively looking for solutions
Channel__c.Organic Search: Found us through organic search - researching on their own
Channel__c.Social Media: Engaged through social platforms - exploring options casually
Channel__c.Direct Mail: Received physical mail - targeted outreach campaign
Channel__c.Display: Saw display ads - awareness building stage
Channel__c.Trade Show: Met at trade show - evaluating multiple vendors

Type.Conference: Industry conference attendance - networking and learning
Type.Email: Email campaign - nurture or promotional content
Type.Trade Show: Trade show booth visit - exploring vendors
Type.Referral Program: Referred by existing customer - high trust signal
